metadata.title: CVE-2024-27064 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_tables: Fix a memory leak in nf_tables_updchain Ifnft_netdev_register_hooks() fails, the memory associated with nft_stats isnot freed, causing a memory leak. This patch fixes it by movingnft_stats_alloc() down after nft_netdev_register_hooks() succeeds.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
